steps.title: The ❤️ signifies true romantic love.
steps.content: The ❤️ signifies true romantic love. [1] X Research source While you can use this emoji to show that you love anyone or anything, it’s most often associated with romance and lovers. [2] X Research source “I love you, babe! ❤️” “You look amazing! ❤️😍”

steps.title: The 💕 means love is in the air.
steps.content: The 💕 means love is in the air. Use the double heart emoji to signify mutual love between two people, usually in a romantic sense. [3] X Research source “Can’t wait to see you! 💕” “💕 Date night with my bae 💕”

steps.title: The 💗 is usually used to indicate falling in love.
steps.content: The 💗 is usually used to indicate falling in love. If you’ve got growing feelings of love for someone, show that with this sweet emoji. [4] X Research source “Being with you makes me so happy! 💗” “I never know I could love someone this much. 💗💗”

steps.title: The 💓 represents intense love.
steps.content: The 💓 represents intense love. You can also convey liveliness or life with this emoji that depicts a beating or vibrating heart. “He said he loves me! 💓💓” “I’ve never felt like this before. 💓”

steps.title: The 💘 is reminiscent of Valentine’s Day.
steps.content: The 💘 is reminiscent of Valentine’s Day. Do you feel like you’ve been shot with Cupid’s arrow? Let the world know with this heart emoji. [5] X Research source “Happy Valentine’s Day, Alex! 💘” “You + Me 💘💘💘”

steps.title: The 💝 represents giving your heart to someone.
steps.content: The 💝 represents giving your heart to someone. This gift-wrapped heart shows that you’ve let someone into your heart. It can also signify gift-giving. “Forget the key, I’m giving you my whole heart. 💝” “Thank you so much for the gift! I love it! 💝✨”

steps.title: The 💖 puts a sweet spin on love.
steps.content: The 💖 puts a sweet spin on love. This pretty emoji represents love and affection with a playful or sweet tone. [6] X Research source “Baking cakes with Anya today! 🎂 I love spending time with my mini-me! 💖” “ 💖 Thank you for all of the birthday wishes! 💖”

steps.title: The 💞 show mutual understanding or overwhelming joy.
steps.content: The 💞 show mutual understanding or overwhelming joy. If your S.O. makes you incredibly happy and you feel like soulmates , use this emoji to share your feelings. [7] X Research source “He asked me to marry him! 💞💍” “Together forever 💞”

steps.title: The 💔 represents heartbreak.
steps.content: The 💔 represents heartbreak. Drop a broken heart emoji to convey a sense of suffering or betrayal. [8] X Research source “I’m crushed. 💔” “After 2 years together, she broke up with me over text. 💔😭”

steps.title: The ❣️ depicts enthusiasm or agreement.
steps.content: The ❣️ depicts enthusiasm or agreement. Use this heart emoji to show that you’re excited about something or on the same page with someone. [9] X Research source “It’s a date! ❣️” “That sounds amazing ❣️”

steps.title: The 💜 represents compassion.
steps.content: The 💜 represents compassion. Use the purple heart emoji to show that you care. “I’m sorry you’re going through such a tough time. 💜” “Good luck today! 💜”

steps.title: The 💙 indicates trust, harmony, peace, or loyalty.
steps.content: The 💙 indicates trust, harmony, peace, or loyalty. Pick the blue heart emoji to show love in a platonic way . Or, use it to show a sense of happiness. “I’m always here for you, bro. 💙” “What a great day! 💙”

steps.title: The 💚 can represent healthy living or jealousy.
steps.content: The 💚 can represent healthy living or jealousy. Use the green heart emoji to express envy. Or, use it to represent your love for the environment or dedication to making healthy choices. “Sam won the award for employee of the month. 💚” “Beach cleanup this Sunday! 💚🏖️♻️”

steps.title: The 💛 represents happiness and friendship.
steps.content: The 💛 represents happiness and friendship. Choose this bright yellow heart to give off a kind, caring vibe. [10] X Research source “Lunch with my bestie always brightens my day! 💛” “💛 Happy Sunday, y’all! 💛”

steps.title: The 🧡 signifies friendship.
steps.content: The 🧡 signifies friendship. Send the orange heart emoji to show your support for a friend. “You got this!! 🧡” “Love you, friend! 🧡”

steps.title: The 🤍 represents pure love.
steps.content: The 🤍 represents pure love. Use the white heart emoji to show pure love, such as between a parent and child. The white heart also represents support or admiration. [11] X Research source “I can’t believe sweet Natalia is already 1 year old! I love her with my whole heart. 🤍🎈👑” “I’ve got your back! 🤍”

steps.title: The 🖤 can express dark humor or sorrow.
steps.content: The 🖤 can express dark humor or sorrow. Go with the black heart emoji to show off a dark sense of humor. Or, add this emoji to a message about mourning or loss. “I 🖤 true crime” “Missing my brother so much today. 🖤 I can’t believe he’s been gone for 5 years.”

steps.title: The 🤎 can represent people of color.
steps.content: The 🤎 can represent people of color. Use the brown heart emoji to show your support for racial equality and justice. “How are you celebrating Black History Month? 🤎🖤” “We stand together. 🤎🖤”

steps.title: The 💟 signifies positive emotions.
steps.content: The 💟 signifies positive emotions. This is a general heart emoji that you can use to express love or happiness in nearly any situation. “Looking forward to it! 💟” “I got the best news today! 💟”

steps.title: The ♥️ was made for the heart suit in a deck of cards.
steps.content: The ♥️ was made for the heart suit in a deck of cards. If you’re referencing a card game, this emoji is the perfect complement. “You coming to poker night? ♥️♠️♦️♣️” “How about a little 5-card stud? ♠️♥️”

steps.title: The ♡ is the outline of a heart.
steps.content: The ♡ is the outline of a heart. Use this versatile emoji whenever you’re talking about something or someone you love. “Fridays are my favorite! ♡” “You’re the best! ♡”

steps.title: The 🫀refers to the heart organ.
steps.content: The 🫀refers to the heart organ. When talking about anatomy, heart health, or heart problems, use this emoji to illustrate your point. “This anatomy class is so hard 🧠🫀🫁” “February is Heart Health Awareness Month! 🫀”
